name: Date picker explicit or implicit
Better alarm: Apple or Google
answer: Apple for clean, clear, easy to use choices

name: Play or Pause when video is playing
answer: Pause icon to show user what will happen instead of what is happening

name: Password show open or slash eye to reveal password
answer: Show open eye to show what will happen

name: Show all information at once or in small bites
answer: Secondary content in small bites (progressive disclosure)

name: Table actions always visible or only on hover
Should descriptions align with icon or title
Social log ins before or after sign up
answer: The standard is to put socials first

name: Accordions open with arrow or plus icon
answer: Use an arrow. Plus can signify creation of an item

name: Menus sections separated by white space or dividers
Hover tooltip appear instantly or after a delay
Primary button the left or the right
Show all options or just a few
answer: Hicks Law. Show just a few options

name: Table rows separated by zebra striping or line dividers
Link tree or landing page
Spinner or progress bar
Page headers stick to top or scroll
Filter icon look like a funnel or a slider
Vertical text be rotated or stacked
answer: Rotate the text (Mental rotation of 3D objects)

name: Forms show errors during or after entering data
answer: Show errors after text is entered

name: Should buttons be the same color as your brand
Table header alignment
answer: Left align dimension headers. Right align property headers

name: Title or sentence case
answer: Apple: Title, Google: Sentence. Use sentence for internationalization

name: Add button appear at the top or bottom of mobile apps
Item counts next to labels
New rows to top or bottom of a table
Search bar on the left or right of a page
Icons before or after text labels
Profile pics use a circle or a squircle
Price cards show monthly or annual cost
Scroll or abbreviate tables
Inner or outer labels on form fields
Emojis on your website
Menus sections separated by white space or dividers
Content on main page or a modal
answer: Main page for primary content. Modals for secondary

name: Menus sections separated by white space or dividers
Toggles or checkboxes
answer: Checkbox for multiple suggestions. Toggle for binary options

name: Websites stretch across ultrawide monitors
Icons be solid or outline
